alert.note: Alert for Pembina (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 28 at 8:27PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Pembina affecting Kittson and Pembina Counties. .Water levels continue to rise reaching Major Flood Stage early next week. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River of the North at Pembina. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 50.0 feet, South end of Airport Road closes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 46.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 PM CDT Thursday was 46.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to 50.0 feet Thursday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 39.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
